price: Wakasema: Ikiwa huachi, ewe Nuhu, bila ya shaka utapigwa mawe.
arabic: قَالُواْ لَئِن لَّمۡ تَنتَهِ يَٰنُوحُ لَتَكُونَنَّ مِنَ ٱلۡمَرۡجُومِينَ
footnotes: Wakasema: Ewe Nuhu! Ikiwa hutoacha huu wito wako basi jua yakini tutakupopoa mawe. Yaani wanakusudia kwa haya kumtishia kumuuwa.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: qālū la-in lam tantahi yānūḥu latakūnanna mina al-marjūmīna
